definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ez Eze 1:13 lightning (chiefly in poetry) (Ar. barqun, As. birḳu COT:Gloss, Zim:BP 76, 82 Aram. [[בְּרַק]], barqo0)—abs. ´[[ב]] Job 20:25 + 7 t. 2Sa 22:15 (cf. infr.); cstr. [[בְּרַק]] De 32:41 + 2 t.; pl. [[בְּרָקִים]] Ex 19:16 + 7 t., [[בְּרָקָיו]] Ps 97:4; —lightning,

lit. mostly pl. = lightnings, lightning-flashes Ex 19:16, Ps 18:15 (in theoph., on 2Sa 22:15 v. infr.) Ps 77:19, Ps 97:4, Ps 135:7, Job 38:35, Je 10:13, Je 51:16; so in sim. of swift brightness Na 2:5, sg. only Ps 144:6, 2Sa 22:15 (where however rd. [[בְּרָקִים בָּרַק]] cf. [[בָּרַק]]—so LXXL Klo Che, cf. his crit. n. Ps 18:15), Ez Eze 1:13 (in vision), and in sim. of brightness Da 10:6; swift destruction Zec 9:14.
fig. (always sing.) of flashing arrow-head Job 20:25, cf. [[חרב]] ´[[ב]] De 32:41, [[חנית]] ´[[ב]] Na 3:3, Hb Hab 3:11; cf. glitter of weapon Ex 21:15, Ex 21:20, Ex 21:33.
